attributes.action: stop baby p mother from getting a new identity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fact that Baby P was allowed to die despite 60 visits
from Haringey Social Services is a national disgrace. in which this poor little boy was allowed to be abused so violently every day of his short life with no one to love him or protect him, and the people that should have proctected him were the ones that killed him. his mother sat there and allowed this to happen 
i do not think she should have the right to have a new identiy i as a member of the public and  thousands of others we do not agree with the fact that baby p's mother may be given a new identiy  this is disgrace we as tax payers would have to pay for her to have a new name which isnt fair she allowed this to happen and should now face this for the rest of her life which unfortunately baby p asnt got anymore ...  people are not going to  be very happy about a person given special treatment and lots of money spent on them when they have committed such an evil crime.” 
I personally find it rather offensive that the taxpayer may end up picking up a huge bill to protect this woman’s human rights, given the complete disregard she showed for the human rights of her baby.”

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
